text:
Hi folks, if I want to update a moduleâ€™s HTML to reference an SVG file, how do I do that?

Specifically, I imagine I want some HTML like this:

```<svg><use xlink:href="{{ get_asset_url('./svg/my-icon.svg') }}"></use></svg>```
and I can use `hs watch` to upload the file in the `svg/` directory, but when I preview this module it appears that `get_asset_url` has returned nothing.
